channel.title: [317 - beta] ganjadub beta1 dev. team needed
channel.description:
Hello, ive already posted but it seems it got deleted, probably due to inactivity. But, i just bought another computer and i am getting back to work on [i]ganjadub beta1[/i].
Source: Thrillscape 317 Credits: [u]ForTheThrill[/u] - [i]for the source[/i] [u]Owner Iain [/u] [u]MoparScape Tuturials[/u]
Basically, if anybody would like to take on this project with me, that would be awesome. (:
[i]50/50 decisions. 50/50 ownership.[/i]
[b]What the server already has:[/b]
- 100% Combat - 100% Jad (One Wave) - 100% Fight Pits - 100% Assault! - 100% All Godswords spec - 100% DRAGON CLAWS - 100% All other specs work! - 100% Godwars - Complete King Black Dragon! - 474 interfaces! - CUSTOM HOME - Customs + Bonuses! - Welcome interface WITH rules! - Working Clue Scrolls! - DONATOR Area! - AND LOADS MORE!
--- Extra Features/Details ---
[b]Melee[/b] 474 godswords with specials 474 Whip emote WITH special 474 Cast "Vengeance" works & GFX 474 Veng Other Emote/GFX. 474 Defender Blocks Dragon Claws work with special! x2 on NPC's, x4 on players Melee Following 100%.
[b]Magic[/b] 100% autocast Barrages immediately Magic following Blitz set to 4 seconds 474 magic books WITH normal, ancient & lunar
[b]Range[/b] 474 Crossbow emote Correct bow GFX! Range Following Diamond bolts & Ruby bolts GFX
[b]NPC[/b] Animated Bandos boss WITH Minions. Animated Zamorak boss WITH Minions. Animated Saradomin Boss WITH Minions. Animated Armadyl boss WITH Minions.
[b]Minigames[/b] 100% Pest Control 100% Jad - ONE wave - ANIMATED 100% Fight Pits 100% Barrows Working FunPK!
[b]Shops[/b] Updated shops AND added new home Donator Shop Pure Shop Moving shops! Talk to/trade NPC's!
[b]Interface[/b] Custom Quest interface! 474 Equipment Interface 474 kept on death interface Respondent Sprits
I really just need a team that can help me almost completely re-build this source, and turn it into [b]ganjadub V1[/b]
Please reply below or in PM. Thank you.

item.title: [317 - beta] ganjadub beta1 dev. team needed
item.dc:creator: @ganjadub ganjadub
item.description:
@ganjadub wrote:

Hello, ive already posted but it seems it got deleted, probably due to inactivity. But, i just bought another computer and i am getting back to work on ganjadub beta1.

Source: Thrillscape 317
Credits:
ForTheThrill - for the source
Owner Iain
MoparScape Tuturials

Basically, if anybody would like to take on this project with me, that would be awesome. (:

50/50 decisions.
50/50 ownership.

What the server already has:

  • 100% Combat
  • 100% Jad (One Wave)
  • 100% Fight Pits
  • 100% Assault!
  • 100% All Godswords spec
  • 100% DRAGON CLAWS
  • 100% All other specs work!
  • 100% Godwars
  • Complete King Black Dragon!
  • 474 interfaces!
  • CUSTOM HOME
  • Customs + Bonuses!
  • Welcome interface WITH rules!
  • Working Clue Scrolls!
  • DONATOR Area!
  • AND LOADS MORE!

— Extra Features/Details —

Melee
474 godswords with specials
474 Whip emote WITH special
474 Cast “Vengeance” works & GFX
474 Veng Other Emote/GFX.
474 Defender Blocks
Dragon Claws work with special! x2 on NPC’s, x4 on players
Melee Following 100%.

Magic
100% autocast
Barrages immediately
Magic following
Blitz set to 4 seconds
474 magic books WITH normal, ancient & lunar

Range
474 Crossbow emote
Correct bow GFX!
Range Following
Diamond bolts & Ruby bolts GFX

NPC
Animated Bandos boss WITH Minions.
Animated Zamorak boss WITH Minions.
Animated Saradomin Boss WITH Minions.
Animated Armadyl boss WITH Minions.

Minigames
100% Pest Control
100% Jad - ONE wave - ANIMATED
100% Fight Pits
100% Barrows
Working FunPK!

Shops
Updated shops AND added new home
Donator Shop
Pure Shop
Moving shops!
Talk to/trade NPC’s!

Interface
Custom Quest interface!
474 Equipment Interface
474 kept on death interface
Respondent Sprits

I really just need a team that can help me almost completely re-build this source, and turn it into ganjadub V1

Please reply below or in PM. Thank you.
